sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Foundation & Identity Layer
key_deliverables: AKS Cluster; PostgreSQL DB; CI/CD; Mobile Auth Flow
demo_objectives: Infrastructure deployed via Terraform; Mobile app login via Azure AD B2C
success_criteria: Infrastructure passes security scan; Mobile login token retrieved
risk_factors: Azure AD B2C custom policy complexity
mitigation_strategies: Start MSAL config early; Use standard user flows initially

key_deliverables: Geo-routing Service; Invoice OCR Worker; Mobile Offline DB
demo_objectives: Upload invoice and see extracted data; Create ticket and see assignment
success_criteria: OCR extraction > 90% accuracy on sample; Routing assigns correct SC
risk_factors: OCR accuracy variation; Mobile sync conflicts
mitigation_strategies: Use pre-trained models first; Implement last-write-wins for sync

key_deliverables: Background Location Service; WebSocket Gateway; Offline UI
demo_objectives: Track technician movement in real-time; Use app in airplane mode
success_criteria: Location updates < 2s latency; App handles network loss gracefully
mitigation_strategies: Heavy field testing on physical devices
